txt.en: This is a good place to rest
You have left the rest area
Svanr wishes to travel eastward through Nud-melek once more.
'I am ready to leave and head eastward, [placeholder]. Will you escort me on my journey? With the bridge gone, I fear the way might be dangerous.'
The summoning horn can be found near the Bridge of Khazad-d√ªm, behind Svanr in Nud-melek.\n\nYou should summon Svanr to your side when you are ready to leave.
'This is a good place to rest, [placeholder]. Let us pause here.'

A good place to rest can likely be found near Sudulthurkh, the northern cross-roads of Nud-melek. Svanr can be summoned using the horn he gave you.\n\nYou should make your way east across Nud-melek by heading north of the great chasm.
Svanr is at the cross-roads of Sudulthurkh in north-eastern Nud-melek.\n\nYou should speak with Svanr.
'How my feet ache! We have come a long way from Durin's Threshold, my friend. I am glad to make this last leg of my journey with so stalwart a companion!'
Summon Svanr using the summoning horn when you are ready to leave
Find a good place to rest (use the horn to call Svanr to your side)
